**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 35 2.0 **Price** 4,500 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 **Base Weapon** [Warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47) --- The [Empyreal](/Languages.aspx?ID=16) word for “repent” is etched in golden lettering on the shaft of this _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [merciful](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1869) [dawnsilver ](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2917) [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)_. If you are [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521), you are [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) while carrying or wielding this weapon. **Activate** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Effect** You hold your weapon aloft, calling on righteousness to steel your resolve. You cast [_protection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=238) targeting yourself. **Redeemer Wielder** If you're a [champion](/Classes.aspx?ID=4) of the [redemption](/Causes.aspx?ID=14) cause, you also gain the following two benefits.
  • When you critically hit an unholy creature with the _blessed reformer_, until the end of your next turn, the target takes a –10-foot penalty to its Speeds and can't Step.
  • You can Activate the weapon in the following way.
**Activate** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** You hit a creature using the _blessed reformer_ as your last action; **Effect** You cast [_calm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1458) at the same level as your champion focus spells. It must target the creature you hit, and the creature takes a status penalty on its save against the spell equal to the _blessed reformer's_ number of weapon damage dice. **Craft Requirements** You're a champion with the redemption cause. The initial materials must include 140 gp of [dawnsilver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2917).
name: Blessed Reformer
